message.body: Hey dude, great seeing ya last night. When were you planning on going to culver city?
Yes, great to see you too. We are going to the museum of Jurassic technology at noon if u can meet up.
Are you going to the opening at Regen Projects tonight?
I think we will but one of our crew is ill today so it kind of depends how he feels.
Ah. Do you want to pop by the studio on your way back from culver city?
Yes we'd like to. We are still dealing with a sick man hear so I'll txt u if we make it over there
Sounds good.
If not we can meet up on a diffrent day if u are available.
Totally. I have something tomorrow evening and for now my week is looking wide open
Yeah keep me posted.
Perfect. I think we have a beach day in our future too if you want to join us
Will do mang
What is the address of your and Nathan's place?
Hey Yaron we can't make it to your place today. We will have to try and make it Monday or tues. Also hopefully I'll be back in town in a couple months
Ok. That's cool. Do you think you will go to the opening at regen?
No we are gona stay local and get Jamie recovered. We are probably going to go to some of the farmers markets in Hollywood tomorrow
Cool. Hopefully we will get to do something next week.
Yes, I want to see what you two are doing in the studio
Nathan has Mondays off so that would probably be the easiest. Just let us know.
Ok I'll keep in touch
